Articles.Content:
Hi. I've been noodling around with Orbiter off and on for years. My son bought me KSP for Christmas and I think I'm gonna have tons of fun.

I've got a silly question to start off with: does anybody have any idea where the names Kerbal/Kerbin come from?

Regards,

Kerwood Floyd

Welcome to the community Floyd

Hmmm, a nod to 2001/2010

Kerbin and Kerbal are creations of the lead developer Felipe Falanghe, aka HarvesteR!

Thanks. So I guess I'll just have to be satisfied knowing it means something to Felipe.

I'm glad the 2001 reference wasn't too obscure.
If I remember correctly, "Kerbals" where his name for the little paper men he launched on toy rockets as a kid.
